class.name: Phaser.MSPointer

parameters.name: game
parameters.help: A reference to the currently running game.

class.help: The MSPointer class handles touch interactions with the game and the resulting Pointer objects.\nIt will work only in Internet Explorer 10 and Windows Store or Windows Phone 8 apps using JavaScript.\nhttp://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ie/hh673557(v=vs.85).aspx

public.name: onPointerDown
public.help: The function that handles the PointerDown event.

public.name: onPointerMove
public.help: The function that handles the PointerMove event.

public.name: onPointerUp
public.help: The function that handles the PointerUp event.

public.name: callbackContext
public.inlineHelp: The context under which callbacks are called (defaults to game).

public.name: disabled
public.help: You can disable all Input by setting disabled = true. While set all new input related events will be ignored.

public.name: game
public.inlineHelp: A reference to the currently running game.

private.name: _onMSPointerDown
private.inlineHelp: Internal function to handle MSPointer events.

private.name: _onMSPointerMove
private.inlineHelp: Internal function to handle MSPointer events.

private.name: _onMSPointerUp
private.inlineHelp: Internal function to handle MSPointer events.
